Package org.beryx.textio.swing

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SwingTextTerminal
    A TextTerminal implemented using a JTextPane inside a JFrame.
    SwingTextTerminalProvider
    If the system is not headless, it provides a SwingTextTerminal.
